titles.title: I've Found A New Way Of Living

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I've found a new way of living
I've found a life that's divine
I've got the fruit of the Spirit
As I'm abiding, abiding in the vine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Abiding in the vine, abiding in the vine
Love, joy, health, peace, He has made them mine
I've got prosperity, power and victory
Abiding, abiding in the vine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yo encontré vida nueva
Vida divina hallé
El fruto del Espíritu tengo
Al estar morando,
Morando en la vid.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
/Morando en la vid/ (2)
Amor, gozo, paz, salud,
Todo recibí
Tengo prosperidad
Poder, victoria y libertad
Al estar morando
Morando en la vid.
